title: How to determine if I am intelligent - Quora

response.answer_text: If you can listen to a person, and understand their suffering, if you can look at a problem with multiple perspectives simultaneously, if you can objectively, without any bias able to analyse any event and be unimpacted by it. This is true intelligence. If your intelligence is blinded by your opinions and perspectives, it is always limited to one’s past knowledge. There is no quantification, but you would know, because you would be at your best and none else in the world would be able quantify it.
